Blog.post: Leave me a friggen comment b4 i shoot you

NOT! ah i could shoot myself. its 8:30. i got like NO sleep. why you ask? because we're getting all of our windows RIPPED out and then getting new ones in. So all these creepy guys are around our house looking in our windows... so im hiding in the basement. AND I REALLY NEED TO PEE! but i cant because theres some creepy guy ripping the window out of the bathroom. well im so tired. someone call me. or ill die. lol. You're My Little Pony!! Sweet and innocent and happy, you make people want to spew burrito chunks. Even a Care Bear could kick your ass. urlLink What childhood toy from the 80s are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

You are SALUTE YOUR SHORTS. You are a wangsta who knows business. You have fun in the sun and know how to have a good laugh. urlLink Which old school Nickelodeon show are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Hey guys! i loved the show salute ur shorts!!!! haha it was hilarious! take the quiz, its fun! Well... today i woke up at julies house, last night was a lot of fun! then we hung out and then i had a softball game then after it we went to dtw dairy queen b/c we knew there was the classic car night which = hott boooys! haha so me lauren amy molly and jesse are walking around and talking to people, it was fun! now im home and i have another softball game tomorrow mornin. yay. well later gators

urlLink What Finding Nemo Character are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Man.. im tired. Well today i had cheer then jay ju and jess came over and we hung out... then me and ju sold some cookie dough hahahahahahaha julie, the lady w/ the buttcrack!! i felt like sucha jerk face!! haha. Then jay jess and me went to dt glenn ellyn... ya it was GAY. then i rush home to get to my softball game that im late to b/c i made my dad stop at mcdonalds even tho i hate mcdonalds. So we practiced and then i was up to bat first so i go to the plate and the pitcher pitched the darn ball and it was a strike, whoopdy doo. Then the stupid ump notices that the stupid second base is to far back. so they take about ten minutes to fix the stupid base thing. Then i go up to the stupid plate again and the stupid pitcher's about to pitch and some stupid man see's lightening. great. So we sit in the stupid cars blasting stupid music for about a half hour while i could be w/ my other stupid friends HAVING FUN! lol jk, it was actually fun. and saying stupid a lot is also fun- u should try it. but then we go to oberweis and got ice cream and then i got home and basically wasted my WHOLE NIGHT!!!! haha. well hopefully tomorrow will be better. Well im tired and i think im gonna go to bed :) night night!

You have an entrancing kiss~ the kind that leaves your partner bedazzled and maybe even feeling he/she is dreaming. Quite effective; the kiss that never lessens and always blows your partner away like the first time. urlLink What kind of kiss are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Good Morning!! Im wiiiide awake and ready for cheer! lol im really excited b/c twig and meri are going to put on camoflauge and sneak up on us! haha! i love those girls!! well then after cheer they are gonna come over. and then tonight me and meri are goin to jennys and having anoooooooother bonfire!!! haha, well i hope u take that cute little quiz up there at the top, its fun! well i gotta go get ready for cheer! Love to all~ Li

http://www.juniorhighpastor.com/full_service_2004/ Thats the website for Full Service pictures! they're awesome! Well today i had cheer from 11-2, it was a lot of fun!! So then i came home and was actually REALLY REALLY REALLY BORED. Then I was making plans for tonight and realized Matt Shaw invited me to a party for Full Service. haha so Im waiting for meri to pick me up and literally waiting by the door and 45 minutes go by. So i call her and shes w/ jenny putting on make up and having a jolly good old time! lol no harsh feelings meri/jenny. Then we finally get there an hour and a half late. So we told them we got lost for an hour and a half. Then we jumped on his trampoline, it was sooo fun!!!! hahaha~! Then i went to Meri's and she had a bon fire and some guys and twig came over and we hung out and had fun! Now im home and tired and ready to go to bed b/c i have cheer in the mornin!!

You have an animal soul! Arent you lucky! You are very interactive with animals and can understand them even if you dont speak their tongue. The birds arent afraid of you, deer can eat out of your palm, and every dog will roll over for you. As an Animal Soul, you follow your instinct, sometimes making rash decisions, and not thinking properly. If you dont understand something, you reject and push it away, and can get very disastrous when angry. At the same time, youre a very kind person who can make people feel better, and are understanding and compassionate. One of the great things about you is that your rarely jealous, and know that you have to share and help other people if you want to survive this world. You are very loyal and optimistic, and can make it through the toughest times. urlLink What Kind of SOUL do you posses? (For Girls only) Incredible Anime Pictures! brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Hey All!! well today was actually really boring! i tried to make the best of it tho. My sis went off to 6 flags, my mom went to get her surgery and my dad was... im not sure. some where. lol, then me and my dad went to pick my mom up and we were like hitting eachother in the waiting room with crutches. lol it was fun and people were staring at us. finally after waiting for an hour my mom came out and she looked drunk it was so funny! she asked the doctor if she could take the cast thing off and he said yes, then like 2 minutes later she asked again- haha. Well then i came home and did like nothing!!! seriously i was so bored! then...after having boston market for a week, lunch AND dinner, mrs. henderson (jessica madsens mom) drops by and gives us this HUGE and i mean HUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUGE boston market dinner!! i was like omg!!! lol it was still really good. Well right now im waiting for my softball coach (my uncle) to call to say if my games rained out or on. I really wanna go to the movie tho. Well we'll see what happens!! love to all! Li.*.

hello friends! haha little bill says that. ne ways.... today was pretty good. I got to see my friends! i woke up at like 10:30 and was pretty disapointed my alarm clock didnt go off because i really wanted to go to church. mom why didnt u wake me up?! then i got up and cleaned my room a little and ate french toast! it was so good after eating bowls of cocoa puffs for a week :) then i went back to sleep and woke up at around 12. then i cleaned some more and then family came over and then at 6 i went to the main street chapel and we worshiped and some people shared their testimony for the week, and then we watched the slide show! it was actually a lot of fun!! then i came home and went to Twigs and we hung out and now im here. and im actually really tired. my moms getting surgery on her foot tomorrow. it blows invigorously. She cant get out of bed for a week except for the bathroom. and then she cant drive for 6 WEEKS! ahh. im gonna have to grocery shop with my bro b/c my dads at work all day! yikes. well pray that it will heal fast. well i think im gonna go nightnight. and like natalie im gonna have a bible verse of the day. Phillipians 2:14-15 Do everything without complaining or argueing, so that you may become blameless and pure, children of God without fault in a crooked and depraved generation in which you shine like stars in the universe. Guys- just if your given a job or a chore to do, try and do it w/ out complaining. b/c on the missions trip i learned you'll get no where if you complain or argue and everything will be better and go faster w/ out complaining or argueing. Ahaba .*.Li

even tho i dont really want to be. The past week was so amazing! Ill tell you guys everything! :) Sunday: So we get to the church load the vans and go. We get to New Hope Bible church and boys go take their stuff down stairs- ours upstairs. Then we ate pizza and hung out. It was actually a lot of fun. Then we worshiped... sorry guys but if wasnt the best worship... lets just say the singer didnt have the best voice... i know i know- Ephesians 4:29 haha. but then we found out our team names and our team was Sana'a! Lol its soo fun to say!! are team was awesome!! we had Joan, G, Dan, Will, Lindsey 1, Lindsey 2, Scotty, Me Rachel, Dana, Corey and Ryan. So then we make these boards with little slots and u put ur name on them and people write u "encouragment cards". ha it was a lot of fun. Then we went to sleep and the next day... Monday: our team was off to H.O.M.E. ( Housing Oppurtunities and Maintenance for the Elderly) We were pretty syked b/c it was our first site. Well we get lost and end up and hour late. But man that car ride was soo fun!! haha. Ryan and Corey would not stop making fun of my nose... lol and then we past this sign that said: African Hair Braiding. lol and Ryan goes Alfredo hair braiding? haha omg it was the funniest thing ever. We made fun of him the whole day. haha. well we finally got there and we had a ton of jobs to do. some people mowed the lawn, some picked weeds, some vacuumed, but me dana and rachel got to clean the doors and mop 10 flights of stairs! yep it was a work out. then we came home probly went to the convienent... meh. Tuesday: well tuesday was pretty awesome. We got to go to THE Cabrini Green. it was so cool, like if you've ever seen Hardball the movie where the little boy got beat up- i saw it. It was amazing to actually be in Cabrini Green. But what we were soo excited for was that we got to be w/ little kids. So we get there and the kids arent there yet so we get a tour of the kids club and then they take us over to the building where we got to work until the kids got there from school. So we went into this big building that smelled like dust and old stuff. and we got to tape up paper and plastic on doors and windows for when they painted it the next day. then we swept and mopped and other dirty work. Then we went across the street to kids club. well there were already two groups over there. one from texas and one from iowa. i didnt like them very much. so we're all excited that we get to be w/ kids but then we find out they were going to the beach. we wanted to go but we couldnt :( we were all really bummed out. So then we're about to leave and we want a picture on the playground. So we all get on top and these to little ADORABLE black boys around 4 yrs old come running up and we ask if they wanna be in the picture and so they hopped in. one of them came right next to me and i asked if he wanted to sit on my lap. he said no. haha. then right after the picture was taked he hugged me soooo hard and started kissisg my face and wouldnt let go and he was like a monkey climbing all over me. lol it was soo funny yet sad at the same time b/c those kids crave love so much that they come up to complete and total strangers and just give them a huge hug. Wednesday: Well lets just say wednesday wasnt my favorite place. We went to CCIL (Community Christian Industrial League) We got put in the garage sorta thing JAM PACKED with stuff. it was soo gross. we had to organize it and clean and sort clothes. We sorted these two bags of clothes- one mens suits and another womans clothes. So we take them over to the little store thing and the guy tells us he doesnt like them and we should just throw them away. So we put them in the van to take the New Hope. Then we took a ton of these old computers and threw em in the dumpster and we were smashing them... or trying to. lol they are like anti break. its crazy! but what was cool was that we got soooo much done and accomplished so much and it felt really good on the inside even tho the outside was tired and in pain. Thursday: Well thursday was okay... we went to the Caring Closet. Its a resale shop. and let me just say- if you guys think resale shops are nasty and have weird things in them let me tell you- you havnt seen anything. right when u walked in there was racks of clothes just smashed together so you could barely even shop. then u went downstairs to the nasty smelly basement where we got to work. and all that stuff was actually free. it was for the really poor people who couldnt even afford clothes. But the fun part was- it was like playing dress up the whole time. We found weird skirts and coats and dresses, it was so fun. We found this shirt that said: Does your vorpal blade go snicker-snack? haha it was so funny but i guess u had to be there. but ya then we took a break and went over to a burger king. Its not very fun walking into an all black people burger king with 11 other white people with you. But meh. then there was this homeless man asking for change so me and Dana bought him to burgers. Poor guy. but guys- if you give stuff to the homeless or resale shops and stuff, dont give away the old ripped crappy stuff. because you dont know what its like going through tons and tons of bags and saying- who in the right mind would even think someone- even a homeless person- would wear this. Some were stained or ripped or just so crappy. its sad to think someone was like well this is crappy ill give it to charity. Friday: friday!!!!!! best day EVER!! So friday, we go to Leif Ericson school. We were expecting helping out in classrooms and stuff but we found out it was their last day of school so they were all having parties. so we took garbage pickers and stuff and went outside where all the kids were and picked up trash... well that only worked for about 5 minutes and then the kids just would walk up to you- not knowing one thing about you and saying: Can i have a piggy back? or just feeling someone all of a sudden holding your hand and then u look down and see a little kid you've never met saying hi whats ur name? it was so fun! i was so tired tho- i have never given so many piggy back rides!! Then we went to the after school program which was basically on the playground and i hung out with a lot of kids! they were precious! some of my favorites were, anthony, caleb, cayon, brandy, cadarius, ah they were all just soo cute. cayon was soo funny! he was such a little punk. but i had sooo much fun that day! then we went back to New Hope and then got our shirts and went to NAVY PIER!!! it was sooo fun!! me meri shaw and dan rode the ferris wheel. it was so fun!!!! aaaaaah! Saturday... aka today :( well today we woke up and some people went to the beach and some went to the zoo. me, jenny, meri, and rachel went to the zoo. we had so much fun getting hyper and running around. omg so fun!! well then we went straight home from there. well all that stuff was definately not everything. SOOO much more went on. that was probably the best week of my life. i seriously didnt want to go home, i would have stayed the whole week. well i already miss it :( but im gonna go shower because i havnt taken a warm shower for a week, mostly COLD!!! ahh well bye people!! God Bless and remember... Ephesians 4:29!! haha .*.Li

Its my last half of a day in wheaton for week! lol, it will be my last blog for a while! :( well i dont have that much more to say! But leave comments on here! i love reading them!! Happy Sunday! You are my strength when I am weak You are the treasure that I seek You are my all in all Seeking You as a precious jewel Lord to give up, I’d be a fool You are my all in all Jesus, Lamb of God, worthy is Your name Jesus, Lamb of God, worthy is Your name Taking my sin, my cross, my shame Rising again, I bless Your name You are my all in all When I fall down, You pick me up When I am dry, You fill my cup You are my all in all Jesus, Lamb of God, worthy is Your name Jesus, Lamb of God, worthy is Your name .*.Li

well tomorrow i leave for the ghetto. haha. im really excited! prayer for us! :) well i still have a lot of packing to do. So tonight i went to jess's where we just hung out and watched the Nick and Jessica variety hour- SO GAY! lol then we went to jays where we pigged out on cheese fries and pizza. omg i dont think im gonna eat for a week. uh then we walked around the neighborhood and to hadley and were weird. ya so then i come home and find out julie and krish are going out and now im pissed b/c ju didnt tell me and she should have called me asaps and she was just gonna let me leave for a week w/o knowing- UH. Im gonna have to sick my hermit crab on her. lol... anyways. Im going to pack. Much love*.* Li

well... its my last day in wheaton for a week. where are you friends? why havnt u called me! lol, i just finished cleaning my dear legolas and rumplestiltskins cage. I wasnt sure if they died or not. Well... bobo did. :( sorry brian and danny. But hey- legolas is still alive. Man rumplestiltskin is still alive from LAST SUMMER! lol remember when brendan won him at the fair?! lol ya, actually he won two... but mickey died. meh. actually they are really interesting. one of them bit julie yesterday haha sucker. i trained them to bite my friends b/c they didnt call me today! lol. Well im off to do nothing. Maybe play with legolas and rumplestiltskin.. haha jk, im not that lame. .*.~Li~.*. PS- Rumplestiltskin and Legolas are Hermit Crabs if you didnt know... lol!
NATALIE SEEWALD IS TOTALLY FRICKEN AWESOME! shes soooo cool, shes sucha great friend!! i love her with every bit of my heart!!!!!!!!! Natalie seewald i OWE YOU !!!!

Hey guys!! Well its saturday mornin and im wide awake! i had a softball game this mornin at 9 but we had to be there at 8:30... well lets just say i didnt wake up til 8:30 so my team was all mad at me lol. too bad :) Well we lost... but oh well, it was too early ne ways. I have to ump a game at two. i really dont wanna. It blows big time. if you ump and wanna be my best friend in the world give me a call :) Right... so last night. i went down town w/ ju nel and nat and jordan E. It was a lot of fun! then we went to jordans house- man his room is awesome!! haha its HUGE!! so then while we're in his room he calls Kel, who has matt and krish over. So he tells them to come over but doesnt tell them that we were over. so we get the bright idea to hide in jordans closet while the guys comeover. So here we are in jordans closet(which is actually pretty big) and the boys come up to his room. OMG let me tell you- it was SOOOOO funny!! i couldnt stop laughing!! i was afraid they'd hear me~! so then jordan starts asking questions and saying stuff so that the other guys would talk about us and stuff! omg they said some pretty mean stuff... but then jordan goes man you guys should check out my closet~ its pretty awesome!! lol so kel comes over and opens it and then freaks out and shuts it and so we all pop out and OMG!!!!! kel and kristians faces- they were PRICELESS. lol i would seriously PAY money to get a picture of it. They were TERRIFIED!!! haha that definately made my day!! lol, so then ju and jess came over to my house and we were home alone and doing nothing, thenwe had a water fight with squirt guns and hoses, then arm comes over. Then the munchkins came back from the movies...so we walked to jessicas house. Then we walked to kristians soccer game in SHORT skirts lol, we embarassed the hell out of him... and his coach yelled at us... hehe:) So then we walked downtown and just kinda walked and then called jordan E who had corey and matt over. So we walked over there... we thought it would be a "better" idea to go to the side of his house and throw wood chips at his window... so we're walking and i trip over this huge white gutter- how could i not see it?! lol it was pretty funny. so then we just went to the door and we went to his awesome kick butt room. We watched... my babys daddy... haha. Ya so then i went home... to where 9 THIRD GRADERS WERE SLEEPING OVER! omg i do not remember being THAT weird in third grade! im sitting in the kitchen and i hear: everywhere we go... EVERYWHERE WE GOOOO people want to know... PEOPLE WANT TO KNOOOOW who we are... WHO WE AAAAAAAARE so we tell them... SO WE TELL THEEMMM WE ARE THE LLAMAS! MIGHTY MIGHTY LLAMAS!!!!!!!!! omgomgomomg it was sooo weird!! and then they started to actually play "Llamas. haha it was great. so i come downstairs and go online... and like three of them come over and start to watch me type! lol and they were reading it outloud!!! haha i was like okay... go away.... and i was so afraid one of my friends would swear lol. but finally they left. so i went to bed and now its SATURDAY!!! and i really wana do somthing b/c im leaving tomorrow for missions trip!!!!! ahhh well i def wrote A LOT. byebye ~Li~

Oh my goodness. Well ya know how i said earlier i had to run errands w/ my bro for stuff for my sis's bday? well... on the way to the bank he obviously didnt see a car as he was about to turn. OMG i had to scream at him and he swerved and then went around. omg it was so scary. lol, well i REALLY dont wanna ump tonight. w/e tho. I wanna do somthin tonight besides being with a million munchkins

Good Morning! Im like the only person online... meh? Well today i have to run errands with my bro, i have to go all the way to cantera to get NINE tickets to garfield. its my sisters bday party. And after the movie- they're SLEEPING OVER. NINE 3rd graders. someone SAVE ME. But the worst of all i have to ump tonight. I HATE IT with a PASSION. Oh well. maybe ill get out of it.... well ya... im a little disapointed you faggots out there wont look at my blog. JERKS! lol jk BYEEEEE

Ah well- I just got back from the pointless trip all the way over to atten park for my pointless softball game that got cancelled before we even started the pointless game! But hey- it was still really fun!! me and fefe (amy fehan) and trish were running around in the rain... then my mascara ran into my eyes and down my face and i looked like the 6th member of Good fricken Charlotte. oh well it was worth it. Now im supposed to be cleaning my nasty room but who cares. well my mom does... but thats not the point. Im about to go to nats and watch movies. it should be fun! that is if nat can stay off her darn computer!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Wow, so Summers FINALLY here! Its about time. Well last night i had my girls sleepover. Jay, Ju, and me played Dance Dance Revolution like all night! While the weirdos were sending freaky pics to random people.... and then we watched Pirates of the Carribean. During the movie jay comes down and tells me two of the freaks PEED ON MY DRIVEWAY! lol, i have WEIRD friends. they could have atleast done it in like the grass. yuck. And then this mornin we made cake! yum! but.... there was no frosting. but it was still really good! Then we had a cheer meeting! Im soo excited for the season to start!! it will be awesome!! :D Well my mom is fricken pissing a cow b/c i wont clean my room. UH. s a v e m e

hey guys!! Well its me and jess here and we just got back from Meri's! It was a lot of fun... but im gonna miss u girls :) Earlier today we had the WNHS CheerLeader CarWash- that was a lot of fun too but i got a semi farmers tan...eek! But the Washing of Cars was fun... haha and hold up the signs!! Well tomorrow me and Nel leave for Dauphin Island and then the second week is Arkansas... Dauphin Island will be fun! And we can DEF make Arkansas fun!! Well we basically havnt gotten ANY sleep for a while... so we're gonna go night night b/c we leave real early tomorrow! LoveLi* P.S. Ill miss you girls so much!!! :'(

YES!!! It FiNaLLy ThUrSdAy!!! I CaNt WaIt FoR ToNiGhT! We WiLL HaVe SoOoOoOo MuCh FuN!!!!!!! K- well yesterday after cheer i went to Meri's and hung out... then eric brandon mike and tj showed up and just kinda hung out with us. Then they left... sooo we helped mr anderson set up the tent. then we walked over to the fair and hung out with the three coolest gymnasts EvEr! lol! cj carl and seth! it was fun! AND we got on three free rides!! the one that spins super duper fast and you stick to the walls! omgomgomg it was sooooooooo effing fun its not even FUNNY!!! lol and then we were standing by the swinging pharow thing and the carny guy was like wanna come on? and we were like hell ya and then while we were on it we kept screaming one more on more! and so he just had to let us go on it one more time. so it was a tonnnnn of fun! i cant wait for tonight and tomorrow night! :) then i came home. And ya. now im about to go to cheer even tho im not ready at all. Oooooooh well. Well.... Cya Lata! LEAVE ME A COMMENT! :) Li*

Howdy! Argh... Its 6:00 AM and i cant get back to sleep! I woke up at 5:30 and layed in bed for a fricken half hour. Oh- and not to mention, thanks boys for the wonderful TPing job! Now i can go clean it up! YES! Well i have cheer at 12... and maybe ill go to the FAIR today too! argh dont u hate it when u shave and like the next day it like grew back? ugh well im tired. and have nothing to do. urlLink See'>http://www.drudabear.com/quiz.htm">See what Care Bear you are./a> urlLink Take the urlLink What High SchoolStereotype Are You? quiz. urlLink urlLink Which "Natural Wonder" are you?

hey guys! Im in a good mood right now b/c im eating spaghettios! lol. I have cheer at 12 til 2...then i dunno what ill do. Last night we went dtw and hung out with a bunch of people...it was fun! AH i still have a cold. I cant stand it! My nose is always stuffed up. GRRRRRRR. OMGOMGOGOMG im sooo excited!!! the CoUnTy FaIr is the wednesday!! and thursday and friday! YAY!!!!!!!!!! ill be there like every day of it :) haha then zzzing in a tent on thursday at meri's :D !!!! we'll keep a look out for the sick carny folk. Then friday the North Cheerleaders are having a car wash at wheaton bowl... so if ur cars dirty... or u wanna see wet cheerleaders come on down to wheaton bowl! lol! Then the next mornin me and Nel are leaving for two weeks!!!!! We're goin to Dauphin Island for a week then Arkansas... lol... we'll find some cute hick boys. maybe hang out at walmart. jk, its actually nice there. Well guys i have cheer so i g2g! LYLAS leave comments! MUAHMUAHMUAH!
JNel227 : has a indoor pool JNel227: a live in nanny JNel227: a viper JNel227: with some numbers at hte end JNel227: and a hummer JNel227: im like sick, canadians are richer than americans haha....

Hey! Whatsup?! K- well today me and Meri met up at the French Market and shopped for awhile and got these awesome Burts Bees ! Ya well then we went to Starbucks and got these awesome Iced Coffees ! Mmmm...then we walked to Shanes and met up w/ jess and ate then walked around dtw just wanderin around and talkin... then walked to...Arms...then went back to Nels and hung there then went to TaCo BeLL! haha omg we were soooooo crazy!!!!!!!!!!!! LoL we had sooo much fun!! haha... well then we went back to Nels and stocked up on Water Balloons and met some guys at hubble and threw them! haha it was funny... sorry guys :-/ Well then we walked around dtw...again! now im home :) and i still have a bad sore throat... :'( buts its better! Later!

Hey Guys! Well its fridaay! Yippeeeeeeee! I just woke up and its 8:04.... my nose is stuffed up :'( and my throat is sore ... oh well. Last night i went to dinner with some cheerleaders and then came home and had a few gals sleepover in the tent. It was fun ! hey ya'all! Whatsup!? im real sorry for not updating in a while :( Today me n' mer went to lunch w/ the student body people and the other freshys goin to student body! it was fun ! then me mer and jordan went dtw and then we kinda ditched jordan... hehe and then bought him a plastic gun at wise penny to say sorry... but really it was only so meri could go over there and get her Jet CD ... then me and mer met up w/ steve stolp, jeremy griffin, alex landeros and a bunch of 8th graders lol... i know its a weird bunch but it was fun!! and now im gonna go out to dinner at Fridays with the Cheer leaders ... peace out! LoveLi

Well..... today i slept in and then got ready to go to the softball pizza party. it was fuun. i ate a lot and now im gonna blow. ahhhhhhhhhhhhh so im really bored and tomorrow i have church... and im gonna sit with ryan :) haha. well. im bored and gotta go... not really but im gonna go anyways. bye.

Well... sorry i havnt updates guys. i just didnt really think ne one looked at this. well im watching 50 first dates... again. i love it! tonight we went dtw and hung out. it was okay. not much to do. but it was fun. lol well sorry im not writing much ne more... i will tomorrow- pinky promise :) wellllllllllllllllllll im bored. later Your Suicide.. by urlLink Konstantine Your Name/Username Favorite Number? Sunkissed8848: DO YOU HEAR THAT?!?! LiSaLuWhO622: SHIT! LiSaLuWhO622: FRICKER Sunkissed8848: wait its tuesday Sunkissed8848: nvm! LiSaLuWhO622: oh LiSaLuWhO622: omg! hey guys! well first off im kinda angry that no one leaves comments. ill leave comments in urs, if u leave them in mine. deal? k. well i also would like to have one of those...tag boards or w/e? so someone puhlease tell me :) well- i have to go to the dentist soon. i love going to the dentist. theres nothin better then layin down and havin someone shove their hands in ur mouth and cleanin ur teeth. i just love it! haha, well i can feel that today will be fun. last night sure was! it was the fourth of july!! :) well ju slept over the night before and we hung out watched movies and then the next mornin aka the fourth we put on our cute lil cheer uniforms and sold balloons! well it was VERY tiring. then we came back to my house then nat came over and we got ready for the fireworks which were verrrry fun. lol. :) then we went to meris and had a bonfire which was also V E R Y fun. :) welllllll i must go now. *Li

okay- so last night was so fun! Me and meri went to Foxvalley mall and shopped and stuff... then went to the CONCERT! lol so we're in downtown naperville and have no idea where to go from there? and all of a sudden we hear this song by 15 minutes late!! so meri starts FREAKING out and rolls down the window and sticks her head out- so we basically found the concert by ear! So the concert was awesome- the guy im secretly obsessed w/ was there!! hahahahaha jk... not really. soo then me and meri were walking around and these guys gave us a flyer to see doctor foam... they were kinda gay b/c they were making fun of how we were 15 (hehehe) and how young we were... haha but they were funny! then mer got the lead singer of 15 minutes lates autograph! haha well then me and meri went back to my house and slept over..... no we're here havin nothin to do!! so give us a call if you wanna hang out!
